channel.title: Comments on: Forgotten Experiences
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Taipan
item.dc:creator: Taipan
item.description: Well...we were talking of bad habits, didn't we?
item.content:encoded: Well…we were talking of bad habits, didn’t we?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Yeah... well, luckily I found the article online, as he suggested. So no need for paper saving :)
I didn't know you still visit my blog :)
item.content:encoded:
Yeah… well, luckily I found the article online, as he suggested. So no need for paper saving :)

I didn’t know you still visit my blog :)

item.title: By: Taipan
item.dc:creator: Taipan
item.description: Well...He's annoying with that bad habit of his, isn't he? However "I'll save the paper until we'll meet" helps me clear some memory cells.
item.content:encoded:
Well…He’s annoying with that bad habit of his, isn’t he?
However “I’ll save the paper until we’ll meet” helps me clear some memory cells.
